snippet: Building on better news about the Affordable Care Act’s website, President Obama and congressional Democrats have put a new strategy into effect, spreading the word about the law’s benefits.
abstract: Pres Obama and congressional Democrats, seizing on the good news of an improving health care website and rising enrollments, attempt to shore up public support for the embattled Affordable Care Act by emphasizing popular elements and warning of dangers should it be repealed.

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

lead_paragraph: Building on better news about the Affordable Care Act’s website, President Obama and congressional Democrats have put a new strategy into effect, spreading the word about the law’s benefits.

headline.main: Democrats’ Latest Campaign for Health Care Law Begins
headline.print_headline: Democrats’ Health Law Counteroffensive Is Up and Running

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
